answers.answer: I was just diagnosed wit dg  I feel no different all the times I check are at normal range.

question: I was recently diagnosed with gd. Can anyone who had been prego before and had had gd tell me  they became  or not? Also, my numbers are in the low 100's when I wake up. Does anyone think I really should take insulin? Once I eat my numbers go normal. I already saw my doc so I just want some opinions.
title: gestational diabetes
